allow: Bash(powershell -Command "Get-Process python | Where-Object {$_ProcessName -like ''*python*'' -or $_MainModule.FileName -like ''*jupyter*''} | Select-Object Id, ProcessName, Path")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
initial pass

Co-Authored-By: Claude <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Add runtime resource management and page table infrastructure

- Implement RuntimeResourceTable for managing runtime resource entries
- Add resource management handlers in RuntimeManager
- Enhance macro commands with additional fields \(file_id, prefetch parameters\)
- Add comprehensive resource entry classes \(NandMmapEntry, MallocEntry, PrefetchEntry\)
- Implement page table and address translation infrastructure
- Add utility modules for address management \(addr.py\) and entry points
- Create test file for resource table functionality
- Update project documentation and Claude settings
EOF
\)")
